snippet.title: Occult Crime Police Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Murder. Conspiracy. Thought Influencers. Only you can decipher the mystery of Base 24. Comb a mysterious government base for evidence, catch suspects in their lies, and unravel the truth, no matter how ridiculous it may be!

Available for Steam, iOS and Android on October 12th 2021

http://occultcrimepolice.com/
